name: City Tour
description:
City Tour is a puzzle game that takes you on a relaxing trip through an 80's inspired area. Take a seat and enjoy the ride as you puzzle your way through each level.

As the player you control vehicles driving through the city. Bring them to their goal to reach the next level. As you progress you'll find different kinds of obstacles you need to surpass.

CREDITS

Programming & Art - Lisa Engelen

Music - Waveshaper

Sound - Kastenfrosch
